Module javaNeuralNetwork.main

Package neural_network.functions

package neural_network.functions
The functions package contains all mathematical functions used in a neural network.

These can be split into Activators and Losses. The different Activators all use values from Neurons to assist in activating a Neuron in the next Layer. The Losses are used in the final Layer to compare the predicted and actual values of the output Neurons.

Since:
1.0.0
  • Class
    Description
    Activator<T>
    Interface for an activating function in a neural network.
    LeakyReLU
    Class to represent a leaky ReLU function (can be just a ReLU if the leak is set to 0.0), which is an Activator for Neurons.
    TransferFunction
    A class to represent the transfer function of a neural network, which creates a linear combination of weights from values of Neurons.
